name: pageboy
content:
pageboy noun [C]
(BOY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a young boy who is one of the people to go with the bride (= the woman who is getting married) into the church: The little pageboys were dressed in kilts and the bridesmaids in pink dresses. Compare
page noun (PERSON)
DreamPictures/The Image Bank/GettyImages

pageboy noun [C]
(HAIR)
a hairstyle, mainly for women, in which the hair is straight and quite short and turns under at the ends
kati/GettyImages
